classes.name: AcquisitionProfile
classes.docstring:
Configuration profile for image acquisition scenarios.
Stores parameters for camera settings, preprocessing steps, and other configuration.

methods.name: __init__
methods.docstring:
Initialize a new acquisition profile.

Args:
    name: Name of the profile.
    description: Optional description of the profile.

methods.name: set_camera_settings
methods.docstring:
Configure camera settings for the profile.

Args:
    settings: Dictionary of camera settings.

methods.name: set_preprocessing_settings
methods.docstring:
Configure preprocessing settings for the profile.

Args:
    settings: Dictionary of preprocessing settings.

methods.name: set_format_settings
methods.docstring:
Configure format and encoding settings for the profile.

Args:
    settings: Dictionary of format settings.

methods.name: set_storage_settings
methods.docstring:
Configure storage settings for the profile.

Args:
    settings: Dictionary of storage settings.

methods.name: to_dict
methods.docstring:
Convert the profile to a dictionary.

Returns:
    Dictionary representation of the profile.

methods.name: from_dict
methods.docstring:
Create a profile from a dictionary.

Args:
    data: Dictionary representation of the profile.
    
Returns:
    AcquisitionProfile instance.

classes.name: ProfileManager
classes.docstring: Manages acquisition profiles for different scenarios.

methods.name: __init__
methods.docstring:
Initialize the profile manager.

Args:
    profiles_dir: Directory to store profile files.

methods.name: load_profiles
methods.docstring: Load all profiles from the profiles directory.

methods.name: save_profile
methods.docstring:
Save a profile to file.

Args:
    profile: Profile to save.

methods.name: get_profile
methods.docstring:
Get a profile by name.

Args:
    name: Name of the profile.
    
Returns:
    AcquisitionProfile if found, None otherwise.

methods.name: list_profiles
methods.docstring:
List all available profiles.

Returns:
    List of profile names.

methods.name: delete_profile
methods.docstring:
Delete a profile.

Args:
    name: Name of the profile to delete.
    
Returns:
    True if successful, False otherwise.

functions.name: create_default_profiles
functions.docstring:
Create default acquisition profiles.

Args:
    manager: ProfileManager instance.

functions.name: set_camera_settings
functions.docstring:
Configure camera settings for the profile.

Args:
